borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p class="MsoNormal">Notwithstanding the hereby approved plans, the proposed rooflight in the front roof slope shall be of the same size (width and height) and position as the existing rooflight fitted in neighbouring property at No 46 Cannington Road.&nbsp;<br></p>

<p>The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><ul><li>Site Location Plan (drawing number 3741/SLP Rev P1)</li><li>Proposed Block Plan (drawing number 3741/BLP Rev P1)</li><li>Proposed Ground and First Floor Plan (drawing number 3741/P/03 Rev P2)</li><li>Proposed Loft and Roof Plan (drawing number 3741/P/04 Rev P2)</li><li>Proposed Front, Rear, Side Elevations and Section Plan (drawing number 3741/P/05 Rev P2)</li></ul><p>No other drawings or documents apply.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal">The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.<br></p>
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.<br>
description: Construction of a front porch, a single storey infill side extension, the construction of a rear dormer extension including rooflights to the front and rear roof slope to facilitate conversion of roof space into habitable accommodation, and removal of part of the existing boundary wall
